input_data.title: Deadbeat
input_data.overview: Kevin Pacalioglu may have no money and no clue, but he can see dead people, so that’s pretty cool. Faced with a constant stream of stubborn spirits, Pac goes to whatever lengths require the least amount of effort to help New York City’s most frivolous ghosts finish their unfinished business, occasionally with the help of his best friend and drug dealer, Roofie.

response.analytical_summary: Deadbeat is a quirky comedy series blending supernatural elements with a cynical, low-effort protagonist. The show follows Kevin Pacalioglu, a struggling slacker who can see and interact with ghosts, reluctantly assisting them with their unfinished business. The tone is darkly comedic, characterized by Kevin's apathy and the ghosts' often trivial concerns. It's a lighthearted exploration of the afterlife, filtered through a lens of millennial ennui and a generally absurd premise.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series centers on Kevin Pacalioglu, a perpetually broke and directionless young man living in New York City. His life takes an unexpected turn when he discovers he can see and communicate with ghosts. Initially annoyed by their constant demands, Kevin begins reluctantly helping them resolve their unfinished business, often motivated by the prospect of a small reward or simply to avoid confrontation. Each episode typically features a new ghost with a unique and often ridiculous problem, ranging from recovering lost possessions to settling old scores. Kevin's best friend, Roofie, a drug dealer, often provides assistance, though his involvement frequently complicates matters. As the series progresses, Kevin's relationship with the supernatural world becomes more complex, and he begins to develop a begrudging sense of responsibility towards the ghosts he encounters. While the individual ghost stories are episodic, a subtle overarching narrative emerges concerning Kevin's own personal growth and his evolving understanding of life, death, and the importance of human connection.
response.keyword_sentence: Deadbeat is a darkly comic supernatural comedy series set in modern-day New York City, following a slacker who reluctantly helps ghosts resolve their unfinished business with a cynical and absurdist tone.
